12.content:
Kim Pine and her boyfriend of six months, Leo Smith, were hanging out at Leo's apartment. The two were watching a movie about a boy who who learned to fly (yup pretty stupid) and Kim decided to get up and get a beer from Leo's fridge. Since it was Leo's birthday tomorrow, Kim decided to dress like a slut and wore a tight fitting white T-shirt and shorts that barely covered her ass. Leo wore the usual "i'm black but I dress like this to get white girls" repertoire (which is a Ralph Lauren polo, boot cut jeans that dont sag below the waist, and some nice but not too nice shoes)

Leo proudly eyed his plump girlfriend as she stood up from the couch. Unbeknown to Kim, Leo had secretly been fattening her up quite a bit over the last few months and he was now finally seeing the fruits of his efforts. Ahh yes, Kim Pine was quite the little butterball now and this turned Leo on immensely.

Leo then did a quick mental overview of Kim as she walked towards his fridge.


The girl had developed a nice, round, pot belly filled with numerous gourmet meals and alcoholic beverages. Kim's belly peeked out from underneath her clothes and caused the material to ride up over her sexy yet sizable stomach. Her ass had fattened up to the point where when Kim stopped moving, the fat continued to jiggle for a little while longer. Also her thighs became thick, meaty, and very inviting. Kim's face hadn't experienced any effects from her weight gain and looked the perfectly the same as it always had been. But Leo guessed that she must of been at least 155 or 160 lbs, outweighing him by at least 10 pounds.

"You know....when you do that little fat waddle of yours I think it's incredibly sexy." said Leo as he devilishly eyed Kim's recently plumped up posterior as she leaned over and opened up his refrigerator

"Shut up Leo, before I mail you back to New York or wherever the hell you came from."

"Kim, how many times do we have to go over that black people can come from different places besides New York?"

"Oh yes I forgot darling, You come from New Jersey... how exotic" sarcastically joked Kim as she continued searching for a beer in Leo's fridge

"Your not going to find anything in there sweet pea." chuckled Leo as he watched Kim diligently search his fridge

When she heard this Kim stopped searching the fridge, looked up and evilly eyed Leo.

"You bought some for me yesterday, how could they all be gone today?" asked Kim in a slightly annoyed tone.

"Well I dumped them all except for this lone bottle." deviously smiled Leo while popping the lid to the bottle

"Give it now............" growled Kim

"No! It's my birthday tomorrow and you haven't done one nice thing for me." whined Leo as he held the bottle of beer in the air.

"Well maybe the reason I haven't done anything nice is because your birthday is not today but tomorrow." explained Kim in her usual sarcastic tone.

"Your not helping your case Kimberly." replied Leo as he took a small sip out of Kim's favorite beverage.

The situation was getting desperate, Kim knew that Leo would down the tasty beverage in a heartbeat if she didn't think of something soon.
Luckily, Leo was a man and thus extremely easy to seduce.

"Hey Leo, look over here, you perverted, cunning, dastardly, insanely sexy son of a bitch" called out Kim in a suggestive tone of voice.

"Yesssssssssss." exclaimed Leo (like a child at christmas) while averting his gaze from the beer bottle and on to Kim.

"We can either do this three day sex marathon now, or we can do it after...."

"You put on about 15 or 20 pounds." interrupted Leo

"What?" asked Kim in a confused tone

"Look babe, I love you but I'm also kinda attracted to bigger girls, I'm sorry it's genetics. For my birthday gift I would like it if you umm gained some weight" sheepishly replied Leo as he buried his head under a pillow of the couch, away from Kim's line of sight.

"FINALLY, You tell me about your damn fetish. Ive known about it for like 4 months; ever since Scott told me you watched fat porn on his PC" replied Kim in a kind of relieved sort of way.

"You really think it's a fetish? " asked Leo sort of embarrassingly (because his head was still buried under the pillow)

"Your asking me to gain weight for your own twisted pleasure, Of course I think it's a fetish." replied Kim as she sat back down next to Leo (whose head was still under the couch pillow)

"So is that a yes your gonna do it?" asked Leo (whose head was still under the pillow)

"Yup." replied Kim

"WAHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO." exclaimed Leo as he jumped from the couch and accidentally spilled his beer all over Kim.

____________________________________________________________________

The next day

15.title: Others

info.brief_description: Because "Scott Pilgrim's Precious Little Female Weight Gain Interactive" was too long.
info.description:
No male WG, vore, or excessively stupid plots ("ramond saw scoot looking at fatporn so she ate a thousand cheeseburgers and was hella fat"). Make sure that every chapter has at least two options (unless it's an ending). If I hate your chapter I'll delete it and then create an amusing anecdote about it that I will share with no one.

As far as continuity goes, go by the comic. If you haven't read the comic, that's fine, the movie is similar enough to the point where it shouldn't cause any major problems.

Keep the focus on weight gain. If you want to include a related fetish, you can, just try to work it in well and don't monopolize the story with it.
